en: A curse on life itself that crumbles flesh to dust
A reliable bow with okay accuracy and okay Attack.
A reliable blade with high accuracy but low Attack.
A more advanced magic blast with good SpAttack.
A more difficult to use bow, with decent accuracy and okay Attack.
A more difficult to use sword but good Attack.
Heals the user for {DMG_DRAINPERC}% damage dealt. Deals double damage to Canines.
A young wolf not yet in its prime
It has a couple of extra limbs, and teeth... everywhere
A crackshot with higher skill, but low defense and lower Attack
A stiched together mass of dead human and wolf bodies. It shudders with dark magics
A user of nature magics, with okay SpAttack but a higher Defense for scrapping
A user of nature magic with high SpAttack but low Defense and SpDefense
Studier of holy arts, Light Mages can heal allies but have low agressive and defensive stats
A scrapper on the battlefield with high Health and okay Attack. Good for tanking.
A deer with an enchanted white coat. It'd be worth it to hunt it for its hide.
Stories of Wild Mage's gone mad in search for power are reoccuring characters in cautionary tales.
A ferocious matriarch of the pack. She's extremely protective of her cubs.
Couldn't be older than a month or two
Torn flesh hangs off of this undead wolf
A shambling corpse with low stats
A good defender with decent attack and high defense, but low movement
A high damage melee carry with good attack but low defense
This Unit does not have a Weapon
You currently have no items in the Convoy
Your Party has been restored to Full Health. Tactical Ability Charges have been restored.
Increases Physical Damage dealt to Enemies
Decreases Physical Damage taken from Enemies
How much Damage a Unit can take before they die
Increases Max Focus, which is used to cast Abilities
How many Tiles can a Unit Move during their turn
Increases the chance to hit an Enemy
Increases Magical Damage dealt to Enemies
Decreases Magical Damage taken from Enemies
Opt: Any Neutral Unit left Alive
A slim dog-like creature with sharp teeth
A dead creature that's been reanimated through magic.
This Unit has temporary Armor. When they take damage, Armor is reduced before Health.
This Unit has had their Defense reduced and will take more damage from Physical attacks
This Unit has had their SpDefense reduced and will take more damage from Magic attacks
This Unit is stunned and will lose their next turn
Every Neutral Unit this Unit kills is brought back as a Zombified version of themselves
Fire a beam of lightning dealing Magic Damage to Enemies in a 4 Tile long line. Enemies at the furthest point take more damage than closer enemies.
This Unit takes a huge swing at a large area in front of them dealing damage equal to their {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}. \nUnits on the far edge take more damage.
Deal Physical Damage to nearby Enemies based on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}. Reduce their Defense and Special Defense by {EFFECT_0_FLAT} + ({EFFECT_0_DERIVEDSTAT} * {EFFECT_0_PERC})
Spend all of this Units Mana to deal damage equal to {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT} times the amount of Mana spent
Drain a Target Unit of their life force, dealing damage equal to this Units {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}, and healing for {DMG_DRAINPERC}% the damage dealt
Shoot a Fireball at a location dealing AOE damage equal to their {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}. \nAfter killing 3 and 10 Units the area it hits grows bigger.
Heal an Ally Unit equal to this Units {HEAL_STAT}
Leap into an area, dealing Physical Damage to nearby Enemies. Gain a Shield equal to {SHIELD_MOD}% of your max Health
Heal an Ally Unit for {HEAL_FLAT} Health. Each time this is used, increase that value by 1.
Deal Magic damage equal to {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}.  \nDeals double damage to {DMG_VULNERABLE_DESC_0} Enemies.
The next time this unit goes to end their turn, remove this effect instead.
Dash forward and deal Physical damage based on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT} to anything this Unit passes through. If this ability Kills, grant Energized for one turn.
Throw three daggers in a line dealing Physical damage based on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}. The center Dagger always Crits.
This Unit can fly over all Terrain.
Charge forward and push Units you collide with with you. If you collide with a wall or another Unit, deal Collision Damage to both.
Coins from days gone by. Can be exchanged for goods and services in the Bastion.
A terratorial bird with sharp claws. Hatches from Eggs.
Increases Physical Damage dealt by Abilities to Enemies
Increases Magical Damage dealt by Abilities to Enemies
Places a Trap that when stepped on does Physical damage based on DEX and Stuns
Throw your Spear at an Enemy dealing Physical Damage basted on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}
Grant yourself and Allies close to you +{EFFECT_0_FLAT} {EFFECT_0_MODIFIEDSTAT} and +{EFFECT_1_FLAT} {EFFECT_1_MODIFIEDSTAT}
Blesses the ground in a large area for 3 Turns. Units that stand in the area gain Health at the start of their turn.
Causes sharp and thorny vines to sproud in a large area for 3 Turns. Enemy Units take damage when walking through the area. This damage can't kill.
A mysterious ethereal spear with a strange emblem on it. You've never seen anything like it.
Ignites the ground in a line, dealing fire damage to all Units in the fire at the start of their turn.
Move the Reticle to the highlighted Tile.
Select the Wait option with [img=48x16]res://ART/UI/Inline/keyboard_select_button.png[/img] to end your Turn.
Select the Wait option with [img=24x24]res://ART/UI/Inline/controller_select_button.png[/img] to end your Turn.
Move the Reticle to the highlighted Tile and press [img=48x16]res://ART/UI/Inline/keyboard_select_button.png[/img] to confirm movement.
Move the Reticle to the highlighted Tile and press [img=24x24]res://ART/UI/Inline/controller_select_button.png[/img] to confirm movement.
Here you can preview how combat will play out.
You will do 4 damage to the Zombie, bringing its Health down to 3.
When a Unit's Health reaches 0, it is removed from the Map.
Press [img=48x16]res://ART/UI/Inline/keyboard_select_button.png[/img] once again to confirm your Attack.
Press [img=24x24]res://ART/UI/Inline/controller_select_button.png[/img] once again to confirm your Attack.
Units gain EXP by performing actions in the game.
Once the EXP reaches 100 they will Level Up and get stronger.
Blue Units are Allies. Red Units are Enemies.
Hover the Reticle over the Knight.
This Unit is tresspassing on sacred ground and has reduced ATK.
That Knight looks injured, let's help them out.
We can use the Ability [Lesser Heal] to heal the Knight.
Abilities are powerful actions that can turn the tide of battle, but require Mana to use.
1 Mana is gained at the start of every turn, and an additional Mana is gained when defeating an Enemy.
[Lesser Heal] costs 2 Mana, and has a special property that makes it get stronger every time you use it.
The Knight is a defensive Melee Unit with a unique Weapon.
Move the Knight to the indicated Tile.
When attacking with a Weapon, Unit's with a similar ranged Weapon can counter-attack.
Because the Zombie's weapon has a Range of 1 we're at risk of being counter-attacked.
Press [img=48x24]res://ART/UI/Inline/keyboard_back_button.png[/img] again to Cancel the Move
Press [img=24x24]res://ART/UI/Inline/controller_back_button.png[/img] again to Cancel the Move.
Instead, let's move to this Tile
Because the Lance can attack from more than one Tile away, we're not at risk of being counter-attacked anymore!
Finish off the last two Zombies to complete the map.
This is the Battle Preperation screen
Here you can move Units around before starting a Map by selecting their starting Tile
Feel free to mess around with your formation and when you're ready press [ENTER] to start
Our path appears to be blocked by a tree!
The Knight can handle this for us. Let's move them closer
Some Terrain is destructable. AOE attacks are good ways of carving a new path forward when obstructed
Your Knight is injured again. Let's learn about Tacticals
Select the Knight but don't Move them.
Tactical Abilities are Utility based Abilities that any Unit can use
All Units start with [Petty Gauze] as their Tactical. The [Petty Gauze] has 3 Charges and heals the user 10 Health
When a Tactical is out of Charges it can't be used again until the Unit has rested at a Campfire
Let's use the [Petty Gauze] to heal the Knight
Finish the Map by defeating the remaining Enemies.
There are a couple more tools at your disposal to know about.
The Red Area now shows the Enemies Threat Range: Spaces where Enemies can attack you on their next turn.
Use this to make safe decisions from turn to turn.
Press [TAB] again to toggle off the Threat Range
Let's get some more information on the Zombie in front of us
This time, hover over the Zombie and then press [TAB]
This is the Unit Inspect Screen

There's a lot of information you can get from this screen:
-What Weapons a Unit is using
-What their stats are
-How their Abilities work (if they have any)
You can change tabs to see more information on this Unit by pressing [A] or [D]
One important piece of information is the Units Affinity, seen on the left.
Every Unit has a Color that refers to their Affinity. All Affinities are strong against something and weak to something else.
Fire Affinity is weak to Water Affinity, Dark Affinity is weak to Light Affinity, and so on and so on
You'll get a grasp for what's good against what by playing the game, but if you really need to know you can always Inspect a Unit and check this section down here
When you're done, press [Left Shift] to back out of the Inspect Screen
After every Map you'll have a set of three rewards to choose from
These can be Items that make your Units stronger, Units themselves, and more!
Right now we have a very small team, so let's select the Mercenary as our reward for this Map.
Whenever a Unit reaches Level 3 they unlock a new Ability for the Campaign
Each Ability is unique and can change up how you use the Unit going forward.
Experiment with different builds and Abilities to figure out which one works best for your playstyle!
On this map you have an optional objective: Kill the Prized Buck
Completing an optional objective will grant you a second set of rewards when you beat the Map, so try your best to accomplish it if you can
Select the Mercenary we picked up at the end of the last map
The Mercenary has an ability called [Heroic Leap]
[Heroic Leap] is a Fast Speed Ability, as denoted by the Lightning bolt icon
Fast Speed Abilities don't end the Users turn when used, meaning you can use them as a free action as long as you have the Mana
This is the last map in the Tutorial. Be careful, the training wheels have been removed, and Enemies deal a lot more damage now!
After you win or lose, you'll have the option of starting a real campaign with any of the Units in the game.
Spend all of your Mana to grant yourself +{EFFECT_0_FLAT} {EFFECT_0_MODIFIEDSTAT} and a {SHIELD_MOD}% {SHIELD_STAT} Shield per Mana consumed
\n ... it was sent to the Convoy
Slimey and scaley. This Unit can survive in Water.
At the start of this Units next turn, deal damage to all Units in a 3x3 Square based on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}
This Unit jumps forward 2 Tiles and slashes the Units in front of them dealing damage based on {DMG_AGGRESSIVESTAT}. This Ability has an increased Crit chance.
